import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./RosterPaymentsPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RosterPaymentsPage(){const[players,setPlayers]=useState([]);// ‚úÖ Backend toggle for Netlify/Render
const backendBase=window.location.hostname==='localhost'?'http://localhost:4000':'https://pickem-backend-2025.onrender.com';useEffect(()=>{fetch("".concat(backendBase,"/data/roster.json")).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setPlayers(data);});},[]);const getPaymentStatus=balance=>{if(balance>=140)return'‚úÖ Fully Paid';if(balance>0)return'üü° Partially Paid';return'‚ùå No Payment';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"roster-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"roster-title",children:"Shama-Lama Football Challenge 2025 Roster"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"roster-subtitle",children:"Here are all the players for this year's challenge"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"roster-list",children:players.map((player,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"player-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"player-name",children:["\uD83E\uDDE2 ",player.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"icons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"\uD83C\uDFC8 \uD83D\uDC55"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"payment-status",children:getPaymentStatus(player.Balance)})]})]},index))})]});}export default RosterPaymentsPage;
